name: autobrr
description: Autobrr is an automated tool that monitors torrent trackers and pushes downloads to clients like qBittorrent and Deluge. It filters releases in real-time and supports Radarr, Sonarr, and Lidarr automation.
features: Tracker Monitoring: Automatically monitor torrent trackers for new releases. Real-time detection.
Auto-Download: Push torrents to qBittorrent, Deluge, and more. Automated workflow.
Release Filtering: Filter by quality, size, and custom rules. Precise control.
*arr Integration: Works with Radarr, Sonarr, and Lidarr. Complete automation.
Real-Time: Instant notification and download of new releases. Lightning fast.
Multi-Tracker: Support for numerous private and public trackers. Comprehensive coverage.
Cross-Platform: Available for Linux, Windows, macOS, and Android. Universal access.
Self-Hosted: Run your own automation server. Complete control.
